string.value: I shall receive the 3rd Acclimation Training from #b#p1102000##k.

This time, the monster in question for the Acclimation Training is #r#o9300273##k. He warned me that the monster has quite a temper and that I better be careful. I better return to #bthe 1st Drill Hall#k and hunt #o9300273#s. \n\n#o9300273##r #a207031##k
I was able to hunt 30 #o9300273#s. Now that I have reached Level 13, I should return to #p1101002# and receive an assignment.

Are you ready to start the next training session? You did receive the blessing from #p1101001#, right? Then let's get this started. This is the final chapter of the Acclimation Training, which means after you pass this, you will be pressed into real duties!

The targets for this session are #o9300273#s. They are very much aggressive creatures, and they definitely look the part as well. You'll find a number of those creatures inside #bthe 1st Drill Hall#k, so go ahead and defeat #r30#k of them.
Your real Knight duties are coming up soon. Aren't you excited? Get this training session over with so you can take on the real duties!
I see that you have eliminated all the #o9300273#s. Great work there! Do you feel like you can do well out of this island and in the Victoria Island?

This marks the end of the Acclimation Training sessions. You'll do well and not only survive, but thrive in Victoria Island. You will be thrown into fire, but I believe in you enough that you will find no trouble persevering through all that!

Your true duties begin now. Once you reach Level 13, talk to #p1101002# and he will give you a list of duties you'll have to take on. Please serve and honor the Empress well, and do not engage in activities that may jeopardize your standings in the Cygnus Knights.

I don't think you have defeated #r30 #o9300273#s#k yet...? There are lots of #o9300273#s set up at #bthe 1st Drill Hall#k, so all you need to do is just go there and battle. They are no different than #o1210100#s in #m104010001#, so you don't need to go too far to do that.
